pop.shareMixSaved: Your mix has been sent to the aliens.
pop.shareMixSavedPlaylist: Your mix has been saved in your playlist.
pop.shareShareTop50: Share it and try to break the Top 50 chart!
pop.dontUseName: Don't use your real name, choose a nice pseudo instead!
pop.paramResetInfoText: The bonus will be locked again, like at the mods first opening (Why would you ever need this?)
pop.paramSafeInfoText: All mod's sharing functionalities and external links will be disabled. Like this, you can be sure that your kid won't be brainrottEd with skibidi toilet.
pop.paramRecoverInfoText: Ask our database to search and recover all universes corresponding to this device's identifier.
pop.paramRecoverOkText: %{nb_mix} mix has been found somewhere in the universe and recovered on your device.
pop.alreadyVotedText: You've already voted for this mix. You can't vote a 2nd time 😋
pop.noNetworkText: You've lost your network connection. Go back to Earth to play this mod.
pop.noNetworkVotedText: You can't vote for this mix because you're not on earth.
pop.noCoServerText: Sorry, we cannot connect to our planet for now.
pop.noCoShareText: You can't share this mix to the aliens cuz you're not connected to internet.
pop.noCoShareText2: Your mix has been saved in your playlist so you can share it later if you want.
pop.majText:
Good news dude!
An Unbelievabox update is waiting for you on A person from France's youtube channel!
pop.rateText:
Like the Stardust mod?
If so, be cool and subscribe to the OG developer for Stardust (SlicedLimez) and me (A person from France)! .
Are you down?
pop.silentText: Your device is set to silent mode! Please turn on the ring mode to play Unbelievabox.
pop.dragDropText:
Drag and drop an icon onto
a character to start recording
pop.toShortText:
You have to record at least
%{minimum_time} seconds to save your mix
pop.bonusPlayingText:
You can't start recording a mix
when a bonus is playing, sorry...
pop.bonusUnlockText:
Click on the green icon
to watch the video clip
pop.bonusFindNextText:
Find the right sound combo
to discover the next video clip 🎬
pop.bonusFindPreviousText:
Complete the previous bonus first
to unlock this one 😋
pop.shareText:
Your mix has been saved in your playlist.
Share it and try to break the Top 50 chart!
pop.shareTextBrowser:
Your mix has been saved.
Share it and try to break the Top 50 chart!
pop.bugFunctionText: Sorry dude, your browser doesn't support the “%{function_name}” function. The mod may not run correctly.
pop.notFoundText: Oops! We cannot access your mix for now.
pop.deleteBugText: Oops! We cannot delete your mix for now.
pop.deleteText: Do you really want to delete this mix?
pop.recoverMixText: This mix is yours but it's no longer available on your device. Want to get it back?
pop.shareSubject: Listen to this mix on Unbelievabox!
pop.shareTextLike: If you like this mix, show some love, vote for it and help it break the Unbelievabox Top 50.
pop.shareTextBeCool: Give some love: vote for this mix on Unbelievabox!
pop.shareClipboard: The link to this mix has been copied to the clipboard!
pop.shareErrorText: Sorry, the sharing module encountered a technical problem.
pop.convertMixText: Your mix is being converted into an MP3 file!
pop.privacyText: Dear user, to use my mod you must read and accept our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy

bt.listenAlbum: Listen the official Stardust remake soundtrack

txt.useHeadphones: For the best experience, gaze at the stars

txt.mixlistEmpty:
Your playlist is empty for now.
Go and create your first mix!
txt.mixlistInfo: Your mix stats are updated every %{date_time} minutes.
txt.mixlistBestDj:
This list shows DJs around the world who have the most votes.
Not in the same room? Go share your mix!
txt.mixlistNoCo: You've lost your internet connection. Your stats will be updated when you reconnect.
txt.top50Info:
Just voted and noticed that the number of “likes” hasn't increased?
Don't worry, this list is updated every hour 😉
txt.latestMixInfo:
This list shows the last 50 mixes recorded on Unbelievabox.
%{mix_total} mixes have been created using the %{version_name} version.
txt.replayText: Does your mix sound good? Then save it and share it!
txt.randomText: Let our composers play for you. Pump it up and gaze at the stars!
txt.copyright:
A mod by THE FRENCHBOX TEAM
Copyright © 2024 All rights reserved
txt.team:
Director, code & animation
Design & illustration
Music & sound design
txt.quitAppConfirm: Do you really want to quit Unbelievabox?
txt.prezAlbum: If you haven't checked the original Stardust mod yet, you can find it on SlicedLimez's Youtube Channel. Go check it out!
txt.termsAgreed: I agreed with the general terms of use

dial.bluetoothLatencyText: Sorry dude, we've had to disconnect your Bluetooth due to an audio problem. You can connect to it again.
dial.noNetworkTextCn: Please connect to internet to play Unbelievabox.
